questions.question: Describe the main differences between Power BI Dashboards and Power BI Reports, and outline scenarios where you would use each.
scoring_criteria: Explain that dashboards are single-page, while reports can have multiple pages.
Mention dashboards are only in Power BI Service; reports can be created in Desktop and Service.
Describe interactivity: reports support filtering and viewing underlying data, dashboards do not.
Discuss typical use cases: dashboards for high-level monitoring, reports for detailed exploration.
Provide examples of when to use each in a business intelligence context.
